titles.title: Providing for motor vehicle leasing for the House of Representatives to be conducted through the General Services Administration.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 2/23/1993--Introduced. Requires, with specified exceptions, all motor vehicle leasing for the House of Representatives to be conducted through an agreement with the Administrator of General Services which shall include competitive bidding and, where appropriate, use of the least expensive motor vehicle.
